root.name: Kwari
root.description: Summary Â Kwari is a free online multiplayer first person shooter. Real world currency is used to purchase ammunition.Technical Details The original system requirements were as follows:Windows XP/VistaIntel Pentium 4 2 GHz1GB RAM (1.5GB on Windows Vista)Direct X 8.1 compatible video card128MB VRAM or better1.7GB free hard drive space
